requirement.title: PDB-FCP Interface
requirement.description: The PDB shall be equipped with an interface to send data to the FCP

requirement.title: Voltage and Current Sensor
requirement.description: The PDB shall be able to measure the following physical quantities: \begin{itemize} \item Battery Voltage \item Battery Current \item 5V-Rail Voltage \item 5V-Rail Current \end{itemize}
